info.title: North Data API
info.description: Programmatic access to the North Data DB.

get.description: Retrieve the publications associated with a company.
Retrieve the publications associated with a person.
Retrieve publications. At most 10 publications are returned with each call. For more, repeat the call setting the pos parameter to the newPos attribute value of the response.

parameters.name: minTimestamp
parameters.description: minimum datetime publication was added to the database

parameters.name: maxTimestamp
parameters.description: maximum datetime publication was added to the database

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: DEPRECATED - please use minTimestamp instead

parameters.name: maxDate
parameters.description: DEPRECATED - please use maxTimestamp instead

parameters.name: publisherHistory
parameters.description: true to include historical data for the publisher

parameters.name: publisherFinancials
parameters.description: true to include financial data for the publisher

parameters.name: publisherRelations
parameters.description: true to include related company and person data for the publisher

parameters.name: publisherEvents
parameters.description: true to include event data for the publisher

parameters.name: publisherExtras
parameters.description: true to include extra publisher data provided by 3rd parties

parameters.name: publisherSheets
parameters.description: true to include publisher sheets (balance, earnings)

get.description: universal search: provides best company and person matches for given input query

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the query string

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: set to "company" for companies only, "person" for persons only, otherwise leave empty

get.description: auto complete: provides quick company and person suggestions for given input query

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the query string

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: "company" to match companies only, "person" to match persons only, empty to match all

parameters.name: history
parameters.description: true to include former company names

get.description: power search: supports geo and financial criteria

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: keywords to match in the company's subject

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: address or geo coordinates

parameters.name: maxDistanceKm
parameters.description: maximum distance from given address

parameters.name: legalForm
parameters.description: list of legal forms

parameters.name: segmentCodeStandard
parameters.description: name of the segment code standard to use

parameters.name: segmentCodes
parameters.description: list of segment codes

parameters.name: indicatorId
parameters.description: list of indicator ids for performance filtering (see user guide)

parameters.name: lowerBound
parameters.description: list of lower bounds for performance filterings  (see user guide)

parameters.name: upperBound
parameters.description: list of upper bounds for performance filterings  (see user guide)

parameters.name: lowerBoundUnit
parameters.description: list of lower bound units. Only required for currencies different from EUR

parameters.name: upperBoundUnit
parameters.description: list of upper bound units. Only required for currencies different from EUR

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: list of event types for event filtering (see user guide)

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: list of minimum dates for event filterings  (see user guide)

parameters.name: maxDate
parameters.description: list of maximum dates for event filterings  (see user guide)

companyAddress.name: address
companyAddress.description: company address (you only need to specify the city)

companyRegisterCity.name: registerCity
companyRegisterCity.description: the city of the court where the company is registered, for example Hamburg

companyRegisterId.name: registerId
companyRegisterId.description: the ID of under which the company is registered, for example HRB 12345

companyId.name: companyId
companyId.description: internal company id (do not store this id in an external database, it may change over time)

fuzzyMatch.name: fuzzyMatch
fuzzyMatch.description: true to find best match (similar name and nearby address)

registerKey.name: registerKey
registerKey.description: key that has been provided via the register uniqueKey field

personAddress.name: address
personAddress.description: person address (you only need to specify the city)

personId.name: personId
personId.description: internal person id (do not store this id in an external database, it may change over time)

sources.name: sources
sources.description: DEPRECATED (will be removed at some point of time)

source.name: source
source.description: only publications with this source will be returned

content.name: content
content.description: whether to include publication text / html (may significantly slow down response)

censor.name: censor
censor.description: should be set when presenting the content on a public website

offset.name: offset
offset.description: offset of first item to return

limit.name: limit
limit.description: maximum number of items to return

pos.name: pos
pos.description: if additional results shall be downloaded, set this to the value of the newPos attribute of the previous response

mktgtech.name: mktgtech
mktgtech.description: true to include marketing & technology indicators

eventTypes.name: eventTypes
eventTypes.description: restrict which event types wille be returned if events equals true

maxEvents.name: maxEvents
maxEvents.description: maximum number of events to return

relations.name: relations
relations.description: true to include related company and person data

countries.name: countries
countries.description: list of country ISO codes to restrict result set (empty to retrieve all countries)

status.name: status
status.description: list of valid statuses (active, terminated, liquidation)

sheets.name: sheets
sheets.description: true to include company financial sheets (balance, earnings)

extras.name: extras
extras.description: true to include extra company data provided by 3rd parties

alwaysResolve.name: alwaysResolve
alwaysResolve.description: true to lookup current state of related company from database

Company.title: Company
Company.description: All data for a particular company

id.description: internal company id (do not store this id in an external database, it may change over time)

segmentCodes.description: each property (naics, isic, nace, wz, uksic) contains a list of segment codes in respective standard classification

northDataUrl.description: North data web page for this company

status.description: current status of the company, where liquidation is the intermediate state before the final removal from the register (=terminated)

sheets.description: company's financial sheets (such as balance and earnings sheets)

blocked.description: company data should not be publicly on the Internet because of a request for privacy protection

legalForm.description: legal form (one of: A/S, AG, AG & Co. KG, AÃ¶R, Co. KG, d.o.o., e. K., e. V., eG, EWIV, gAG, GbR, gGmbH, GmbH, GmbH & Co. KG, gSE, gUG, Inh., InvAG, KG, KGaA, KGaA & Co. KG, Ltd., Ltd. & Co. KG, OHG, PartGG, plc, REITG, S.L., SCE, SCE, SCE mbH, SE, SE & Co. KG, Stiftung & Co. KG, UG, UG & Co. KG, VVaG)

Register.description: register entry information (e.g., Amtsgericht Hamburg HRB 9999)

city.description: city of the register court (e.g. Hamburg)

id.description: ID of the register filing (e.g. HRB 9999)

uniqueKey.description: unique numerical key for repeatably unique identification of the register entry

city.description: city of the register court (e.g. Charlottenburg)

id.description: ID of the court filing (e.g., 36w IN 3284/16)

formattedValue.description: the whole address in one human readable string

date.description: since when the referred company name is (known to be) in use
since when the referred address is (known to be) in use
since when this registry entry is valid

registers.description: register entry history of a company

formattedDate.description: date formatted as a string (depending on the language settings)

consolidated.description: true if the financial data refer to a consolidated balance (Konzernabschluss)

items.description: list of financial numbers (maybe empty. If empty, see note for the reason)

id.description: type of number (for example, revenue). Please see the  [indicator reference](https://www.northdata.com/_coverage#indicators) for a complete list

name.description: name in current language (for example, Umsatz in German or Revenue in English)

estimate.description: true if the value is not exact (because it relies on an estimate or an unsafe determination method)

note.description: optional note or comment with respect to the calculation of the financial

formattedValue.description: value formatted as a string (depending on the language settings)

snippets.description: excerpts from the original publication containing the financial data

FinancialsNote.description: additional explanation of financials (or of their absence)

Extras.description: set of additional data, typically provided by 3rd parties.

items.description: extra data items in this set

Extra.description: extra data item, typically provided by a 3rd party.

id.description: common ids are: email, url, phone, fax, vatId, wz

name.description: describing name (for example, "Email" with English language settings, "E-Mail" with German language settigns)

formattedHtmlValue.description: value formatted as an HTML string

effectiveDate.description: date when published changes became effective (e.g., appointment of new director)

creationTime.description: database creation time (which is right after the initial publication download)

category.description: category under which publication was filed in the original source

language.description: ISO language code. This is different from the original language, for translations only.

northDataUrl.description: North data web page for this publication

html.description: text of publication in HTML format

blocked.description: publication data should not be publicly on the Internet because of a request for privacy protection

internal.description: additional data used for internal purposes

type.description: internal identificator for the topic (for possible values, see Appendix E of the user's guide)

PublicationStructure.description: result of the structural analysis of a publication

PublicationSource.description: Source identifier, for a complete list see [Source reference](https://www.northdata.com/_coverage#sources)

EventType.description: event type (for possible values, see Appendix G of the user's guide)

Relation.description: relation of a company or person to another company or person

roles.description: description of the type of the relation

Role.description: description of the type of a relation

name.description: description (depending on the current language settings)

demotion.description: true if the relation ends at the given date

announce.description: true if the relation might be preliminary

type.description: internal identifier (for possible values, see Appendix F of the User's Guide)

dir.description: Direction. The exact interpretation depends of the value of the field "group". Case "succession" - older company is "Source". Case "merger" - Sold company is "Source", Buyer is target "Target". Case "control" - controlling company is "Source".

id.description: internal person id (do not store this id in an external database, it may change over time)

birthYear.description: Sometimes only the birth years is known, but not the exact date

deceased.description: person is known to be dead

northDataUrl.description: North data web page for this person

blocked.description: person data should not be publicly on the Internet because of a request for privacy protection

censored.description: true if results have been omitted because of censoring

offset.description: offset of result array in all results

nextOffset.description: offset to retrieve next batch of results

nextPos.description: position to retrieve next batch of results

total.description: total number of results (usually, this number is not available, unfortunately)

SearchResult.description: company, person or publication that is result of a search

matchedName.description: the matched name (useful if a company has been renamed)

formattedValue.description: amount and currency formatted as a human-readable string

Product.description: a publication that can be bought and downloaded

id.description: string to identify a product when ordering for download

OrderItem.description: information whether and where a product maybe downloaded

status.description: whether the publication is ready for download

url.description: url to download from (when the status is 'ready')

Sheet.description: represents balance sheets, profit and loss statements, and similar structures

type.description: the kind of financial data reported in this sheet

consolidated.description: true if the financial is consolidated (including dependent companies) or not (excluding)

date.description: the date of entries in this column

level.description: if the sheet is structured as a tree, indicates the depth of the nesting of this row.
